channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
Hi all i wanna learn some stuff about clients. And was hopeing someone here could help me :)
Things i wanna learn:
Adding items to the Client & Source (E.G Colored Whips.) Changeing the background.
Changeing what the tabs look like. (E.G [IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg121/piepk/g.jpg[/img]) By this i mean i can select all of the prayer at the same time :'( and i dont realy like what they look like, so i wanna make them normal and make them apear above my head.

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @bamse9400 bamse9400
item.description:
@bamse9400 wrote:

The thing with change look of tabs is easy enoight just go to cache and interface then you find all pictures then just exchange but make sure its same size…

i just need to find out how to move tabs exemple the ones in the bottom to the other site of screen maybee

Read full topic
